Dear Earl,
First, may I ©ay it was good seeing you at Norman* Your work with the
UFPA crowd deserves special commendation, and your suggestion concerning a
conference Involving the college administrators needs more attention than we
were able to give it at the final board meeting* It is in this regard that
I am writing*
Would you fire to me by return mail, if possible, a concrete proposal
for implementing this suggestion* Perhaps we can discuss it briefly at the
meeting of the Advisory Committee in Ann Arbor on the evening of the 11th,
but most of that time must be devoted to discussing our conference the next
days so it would be well for you to put your mind to it and dash off a full
proposal for consideration of the Executive Committee when we get together on
the l?th* I suggest that you send copies of the mem© to all members of the
Board so we my have a reaction from them all before the meting*
I«ve been sending notes to the Presidents and Superintendents of new
members of the Board, congratulating them on the election of their represents^
tivee to the Board and requesting that they give these representatives the
benefit of their own thinking on matters involving NAEB* Would it be helpful
if I did a similar letter for Presidents of the continuing members?
I look forward to another pleasant year of association with you on the
Board and hop© you will continue to react to all matters facing us as you have
done in the past*
Would you please consider this official notice of your reappointment to
the Chairmanship of our TV Operations Committee and give me an immediate reply
suggesting those on the previous committee you think should be continued and
new names you would like to have added*
Best wishes for the year ahead*
Sincerely,
GA/sbr
Grsydon Ausmus
President
